name: Offroad Truck Dump
description:
Offroad Truck Dump is a simulator which lets you drive the garbage truck and clean the offload hilly areas in a fun filled drive. This heavy equipment simulator game is definite to give you the fun you require to play and feel the real heavy equipment simulation.Pick up trash from multiple hill stations , you will love realistic hauler animation for collecting garbage and disposing off in recycling plant.
Features
> Drive big cargo dump trucks
> Unlock 4 different big cargo trucks
> Try to bring all the rocks to the rock factory
> Easy to play
> On screen controls
